mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(TDAA.allow_ip) FROM TB_DATA_API_AUTH AS TDAA WHERE TDAA.api_type=#{apiType} AND TDAA.id_type=#{idType} AND TDAA.id=#{id}) = 0 THEN 1 WHEN (SELECT COUNT(TDAA.allow_ip) FROM TB_DATA_API_AUTH AS TDAA WHERE TDAA.api_type=#{apiType} AND TDAA.id_type=#{idType} AND TDAA.id=#{id} AND TDAA.allow_ip=#{allowIp}) = 0 -- IP 체크 실패 THEN 2 ELSE 0 END AS flag;

SELECT (SELECT TD.serial_num FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TD.idx = TMDM.device_idx) AS serial_num, TMDM.station_name AS station_name FROM TB_MEMBER_DEVICE_MANAGE AS TMDM WHERE TMDM.member_idx = (SELECT TM.idx FROM TB_MEMBER AS TM WHERE TM.user_id=#{memberId}) AND TMDM.device_idx IS NOT NULL

SELECT (SELECT TD.serial_num FROM TB_DEVICE AS TD WHERE TD.idx = TMDM.device_idx) AS serial_num, TMDM.station_name AS station_name FROM TB_MEMBER_DEVICE_MANAGE AS TMDM WHERE TMDM.member_idx in (SELECT (SELECT TM.idx FROM TB_MEMBER AS TM WHERE TM.idx = TGMM.member_idx) FROM TB_GROUP_MEMBER_MANAGE AS TGMM WHERE TGMM.group_idx=(SELECT TG.idx FROM TB_GROUP AS TG WHERE TG.group_id=#{groupId}))

SELECT TDH.dcode, TDH.dtype, TDH.dname, TDH.sdcode, TDH.sggcode, TDDD.pm10_value, TDDD.pm25_value, TDDD.up_date FROM TB_DONG_HCODE AS TDH LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DONG_DUST_DATA AS TDDD ON TDH.dcode=TDDD.dcode ORDER BY TDH.dcode

SELECT TDH.dcode, TDH.dtype, TDH.sdcode, TDH.sggcode, TDH.dname, TDI.lon, TDI.lat, DATE_FORMAT(TDH.reg_date ,'%Y%m%d%H%i') AS up_date FROM TB_DONG_HCODE AS TDH LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DONG_INFO AS TDI ON TDH.dcode=TDI.dcode ORDER BY TDH.dcode
